name: EnvironmentalModifier
desc: A modifier that must resolve to a concrete modifier in an environment before use.

items.name: func resolve(in: EnvironmentValues) -> Self.ResolvedModifier
items.desc: Resolve to a concrete modifier in the given environment.

items.name: associatedtype ResolvedModifier : ViewModifier
items.desc: The type of modifier to use after being resolved.

declaration: protocol EnvironmentalModifier : ViewModifier where Self.Body == Never
